DOC.brief_summary: ( ) To compare new diagnostic PCR establish diagnostic procedure T. pallidum ( serology , dark field microscopy ) , H. ducreyi ( cultivation ) , HSV type 1 2 ( cultivation , PCR ) . ( ii ) To assess frequency infection T. pallidum , H. ducreyi HSV type 1 2 patient genital , anal oropharyngeal ulcer new PCR .
DOC.brief_title: New Multiplex Real-time PCR Genital Ulcer Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patient genital , anal oropharyngeal ulcer Age minimum 18 year . Informed consent must obtain patient/control patient write form prior study procedure . Exclusion criterion : Antibiotic therapy within 2 week visit
